Text:
Thank you very much for this update. Much appreciated! 

Will keep an eye open for malware and keyloggers though, as you can never be too careful. I'll report back on this later.

Took a look through the archive - Contents consist of .LUA, .XML, and .TGA files, with a couply of WoW-specific version (.TOC) files.  Only source of infection would be in the .TGA files - and Kaspersky scans the archive as c;ean
cant anybody do anything nice these days without people thinking its a virus/malware... thank you very much appreciate it

@ b1hb0y

I trust forland91, but ppl can never be too careful, i still scan the files every time and even check the code for changes against the last version i checked.
Working for 4.2.0a, will post if i find bugs. Thanks for the upload!!!! :D
still amazing :D thank you again Forland91!
